website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you are looking for a waist trainer for light workouts but requires most wearers to go up a size.
pros: Designed for wear during light exercise
Lined with soft cotton fabric that helps prevent irritation and reinforced with flexible materials that provide support
cons: It runs on the small side, which can cause discomfort if fastened too tightly, so we recommend getting one size up
It's also on the higher end of the price range

customer_reviews.title: Measure length and waist size for correct sizing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and an original Ann Chery. Follow the size chart of the ann chery website and it should fit fine! I am 5'4 and I i wear a 4-6 and the medium fit great. I have have one other ann chery trainer in the 3 rows of hook version. I will say this 2 row version fits me much better because i have a short torso but if you are taller or have a long torso go with the three row version! Hope this helps someone because they are very different in length
customer_reviews.author: Just May

customer_reviews.title: Tell the truth shame the devil
customer_reviews.text: Just as the reviews stated it runs a lot smaller than expected my waist is a 33 and I had to buy a 42 the largest size at the top it's a lot of open space . If you have a baby pouch or hang time belly fat this probably will happen to you also .I'm very hippy also. It rises just a lil bit at the bottom not to much as long as I have it on the right hook.I put it on 4 times during work no results yet but I do need to be more consistent. I will submit after photos in a month but sont wait on me hurry up and buy¥€*}%
customer_reviews.author: Christina belisle

customer_reviews.title: ... reviews to make my purchases instead of writing them like I should be
customer_reviews.text: I'm always reading reviews to make my purchases instead of writing them like I should be. I am 5'7 and curvy but not fat. My waist is 31 inches and I bought this according to the size chart pictures from the company in the other review (not the size chart by the product). I bought a 2xl (40inch) and it fits great and has room to go down as my waist shrinks (hopefully). The color is bright pink as pictured. It is not long, it only covers the midsection and not lower tummy bulge, so you will need to choose a different product if you want it to cover low abdomen. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany C

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I’ll say it fits as expected because you want it a little snug. Honestly I bought this during the rage of waist trimmers. Did it shave off a few inches? No but I wasn't using it everyday. I only wore it a few times at the gym and ultimately I went back to my regular waist trimmer. I liked how it made you stand up straight but at the same time I didn’t like how it hurt your back if you did slouch a little. Overall I might recommend it but it’s not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Cute at first, cinching effect doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this waist cincher, if made me look super tiny in the waist and sweat more at the gym. Unfortunately, now it feels like it doesn't hold me in anymore. The trainer itself is NOWHERE as long as is advertised--unless the model is 5'0". I'm 5'6" and this is a little short on me. Overall, the cincher works great at first but I'm disappointed that the material doesn't hold up as long and barely holds me in at all anymore after only 3 weeks. :(
customer_reviews.author: Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Good waist  trainer Good price
customer_reviews.text: I like this waist trainer. My stomach is a size 40 and I got this trainer in a size 40 and it fits perfect. I started out on the first set of hooks now I’m on the second set of hooks. I also got some caffeine cream for free that came with my trainer . I really like this seller and I will order from this seller again. Also it arrived sooner then expected.
customer_reviews.author: S.S

customer_reviews.title: Okay, so I ordered up a size and got ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I ordered up a size and got a medium because my waist is in between 29-30 inches. I immediately tried to put it on and could only hook the top two and bottom two. I orginally started a return, thinking I needed a bigger size...but then I tried one more time and I got it on! It is definitely a struggle to get it on. Definitely order up a size!! I am normally a medium in most things, so I should've ordered a large but the medium fits very snug. I have not had it on long so I cannot talk about the results but I feel the most important thing with this is ordering UP.
customer_reviews.author: Ashtan O.

customer_reviews.title: I would like a replacement and I’m unable to return the defective ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s not even a month and my waist trainer is already falling a part. I wanted to email the seller privately but I’ve been unable to do so. I purchased this on Nov13 and the hook area is becoming undone. I would like a replacement and I’m unable to return the defective one as I’ve already left the country for the holidays. I’ve used glue in an attempt to put it back together so I can get a few wears out of it. I’m very disappointed. This is not my first purchase of a waist trainer but it’s the first one to come apart after only 2 weeks!!
customer_reviews.author: Aeropaero

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I tend to fluctuate between a 29-31 inch waist. I got a small in the blue (short cus I have a short torso). It fit nicely, snug, and no wrinkling. Good seller. I’ve actually bought a ton of them from other sellers, this was by far the best one I’ve received.
customer_reviews.author: Beee

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really do enjoy wearing this! I wear it to work, the gym, and i'm working on wearing it to sleep. It even helps with posture which I sometimes struggle with. Right away it makes my waist look like a barbie doll waist, which is awesome. Sometimes I even wear it out since it makes my curves look so good! I have a square body, so it definitely makes my body look like an hour glass. I do wish it had 3 clips so I could move on to the third one, since I am moving into the second now. But nothing too bad. It is great over all.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Way to small not true to size at all
customer_reviews.text: Very sad got this and NEVER was able to use it. It actually would fit my five year old. Not worth buying. I never got to return it because I had to travel for emergency so time expire for me to Return .... if u order a medium- order a xxxl maybe you’ll get a decent fit crazy how small it runs. It’s like xxs ( Asian girl waist )
customer_reviews.author: Betziann Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I used to weigh 425 pounds and have lost 200 pounds, but it is getting harder to lose the remaining weight. After doing a lot of reading on waist trainers, and a recommendation from a friend, I decided to try Ann Chery. Not dissapointed with my purchase at all! I've only had it a few days but I am in love with it, it's tight but it makes me work up an extra sweat during workouts. It is kind of difficult to bend over with it on, but I guess that's kind of the point :-) I will keep everyone updated with progress.
customer_reviews.author: Nadzieja

customer_reviews.title: I love my waist trainer
customer_reviews.text: I love my waist trainer. Being naturally small i was unsure whether this would help me or not, but it seriously does. I ordered the smallest size and honestly though i wouldn't be able t get it on when it first arrived, but after a ten minute struggle it was on the first set of hooks. I am now on the second hooks and can do cardio comfortably in it. I have recommended this trainer to a ton of people. The only downsides are that it is uncomfortable to drive in at first, and that you have to wash it by hand constantly if you work out and sweat. I started seeing permanent results after about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Olson

customer_reviews.title: Not legit!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality and I believe it to be a fake. I have another hot pink Ann Cherry latex shaper and it fits, looks and feels completely different. First of the the hooks are already detaching and while you try to hook higher the lower hooks come apart. The material is not a true thick latex. I even cut in mine to verify. The putter purple layer is a thin cheap latex. The boning is extremely flimsy and the top digs in under the breast. Not worth it and I wish I could return, but already wore it :/
customer_reviews.author: Denae

customer_reviews.title: When making your choice to buy decide what its for.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It fit MY NEEDS. If you are like me (hesitant to purchase) first decide what you want out if this product. I wanted something that will slim my waist, comfortable enough to use for long hours, and something I can use to workout in. UPDATE: this thing works! I've been wearing it everyday for a week for up to 8 hours each day! Today I even took a nap while having it on. This is one you can life in; I've worked out in it, gone to work, and am now on the last row. I'll be down to a smaller size in a few more weeks and will buy another one! So worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Maria P

customer_reviews.title: Now I maintain my weight after almost a year and a half and the size 32 is perfect. It doesn't restrict me at all
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'1 and 127lbs and I use a Size 32. But I gradually went down. I started working out at the weight of 132lbs. The first Waist trainer I purchased was a size 34. That one started fitting lose after I lost the weight and so I went down to a size 32. Now I maintain my weight after almost a year and a half and the size 32 is perfect. It doesn't restrict me at all. So basically, go with your correct size so you can benefit from using it long term. I wear it for 11 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Vialda Molano

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!
customer_reviews.text: -the quality is good. Very sturdy with two tightening sizes. It feels good on actually with a minor odour of latex. I imagine you could wear this under dresses and it would look very flattering. I have no idea if it 'actually' works but I saw an immediately change in appearance after I slipped it on. I could only imagine the long-term results will be a reflection of this. The only downside - you can't wear it when you're full! It's good to wear while working at the office while sitting for long hours. It's not too tight for me. I bought a size small - 5'6", 130lbs and it wasn't a struggle to put on.
customer_reviews.author: BangNewan

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, size up.
customer_reviews.text: So I am really excited to try these waist cinchers out but I ordered the black in medium, and it is too small for me. I normally wear a medium in everything clothing wise so I was surprised at how small these run. If I loose some weight it should fit though. I just ordered a large and will update when I receive that one. The manufacture quality of the product itself is great and feels sturdy like my steel boned waist cincher from Orchard Corset. It is made in Colombia. It is an authentic product.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap! Runs small and the cheap hooks snapped off while I was trying it on for the first time! Returning this junk! High probability this is counterfeit Ann Chery. Amazon needs to be investigate this. Very unfortunate and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: The best waist trainer on the market
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I have a bought this one before and then tried multiple other brands afterward. I have come to the conclusion none of them work like this one. This waist trainer is reliable sturdy easy to put on and off comparable to other waist trainers. I definitely will only be continuing purchases through Anne Sherry from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend
customer_reviews.text: Oh how I love this thing lol I ordered an XL, I'm 5'8" 199 Lbs and I wear a size 10/12 dress. When I originally ordered this I struggled to get this on but after the 2nd time wearing it, it was much easier. Started out on the 1st row but now I'm currently on the 2nd row and it's not fitting as securely. So I'll need to go down a size. My waist is noticably smaller and when I wear this to the gym on my high cardio days, it makes me sweat like crazy around my stomach. Love, Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: with good material, definitely not cheap only thing is it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made trainer, with good material, definitely not cheap only thing is it does run way to small , I weigh 102 lbs so I bought a small one.. I couldn't even hook the first little hook. I returned and got a medium, that worked better ,. But then never used it because shortly after I got it I became pregnant so I will try it after I'm due, I'll see then how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Nydia Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great material and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great waist shaper no doubt there! Great material and genuine Ann Chery. I did have to return it because of the length. Im 5'1 and thought this would work but its just way too long. It cuts into the bottom of my bust and goes halfway down my hips. I am pretty proportionate so not a short torso just short overall and this sadly didn't work. I would definitely recommend this to others though who may have a longer torso.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: It was just a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: It was a size smaller than expected and I wanted to exchange it but they don't allow that for reasons. So I would have to refund it but the label required a stamp which wasn't a problem with other orders I've had in the pas, they're refunds were free. So I just need one size bigger but I don't want to go through the trouble of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kily

customer_reviews.title: I love how it looks on her so much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and she is in heaven!! She notice the difference right away. I love how it looks on her so much, that i bought one for myself. lol. My mom is 5'0 and is around 190lbs, so i got her the XXXL. I myself am 5'1 and 114lbs, so i went for a small (hopefully it fits, fingers crossed) I will post a review as soon as i get it and put it on. The material is soft and very comfortable, as my mom explained to me. She has had it for 2 days so far, so i will update (hopefully with a picture) once she has been using it for a month. :)
customer_reviews.author: Maria C.

customer_reviews.title: I don’t trust this seller
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these many times and they have noticeably changed. I put 2 side-by-side for comparison. Different tags, different stitching, different color, different EVERYTHING. Just go on the company website and purchase it there. You get what you pay for! The latches pop out. What’s the worst issue? THE WIRE BENDS causing cuts in your stomach and leaves you looking really deformed. I can’t even wear these to the gym anymore. I honestly think it would be cheaper to just buy the real deal than having to replace cheap knockoffs
customer_reviews.author: EViera

customer_reviews.title: way too small!
customer_reviews.text: I don't consider myself to be a big girl. I'm 5'3 and 120 pounds and don't have a fat stomach. I wanted to try this out to see if it'll give me back the same curves as I had back in HS and to lose maybe the last ten pounds. I got the small and I was nowhere near getting it on, not even with my boyfriend's help. I returned it for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: This product is great! If you have a hard time getting it ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! If you have a hard time getting it on at first don't worry. With time you'll get it on with much more ease. it helps me to sit up straight and i've noticed the difference in my stomach already after a week. My curves seem more defined and my midsection seems more compact. Be aware that if you supper from a 'thicker' upper body and have excess fat around your back or under your arms this will push it up a bit. It's not awful, but if you're wearing a really fitted dress you'd notice it a bit. A great product overall
customer_reviews.author: pam cora

customer_reviews.title: Love it ! Here's how to size yourself ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't necessarily run small but if you have an hourglass shape already I would order a size up. I have a 27" waist and ordered for that size. It fit perfect around my actual waist but was too small around my hips and below my bust. So I went a size up and it fits great. If your hips and waist are about the same then order your waist size. Love this and can already see a difference in my shape after just a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Product as pictured. I am 5', with a 29-30 inch waist and I weigh about 117. This product does run small. I normally wear a small in shirts, so I went ahead and went with the medium (one size up). I'm glad I did. It seemed tiny, I had to lay down and my husband assisted me in hooking the first row. Feels great on, tight how it's supposed to be but I'm not suffocating either. Can't wait to see if m waist does shrink with this, proper eating and exercise. I would buy again. (Hopefully in the next size down if/when my waist shrinks)
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Was really excited about getting this but.......
customer_reviews.text: I read they ran small, so I ordered one size up.....no way was it going to work once I got it. It was small which is supposed to fit a waist of 32", well when you measure it from side to side, yea 25" in length, how does that wrap around 32"???? The quality seemed pretty good, I liked the color. One thing I noticed also, the eye hooks didn't match up, so that was going to be an issue however due to it being way to small I couldn't determine if that would make the fit of the corset. I returned the product and have not re-ordered, jury is still out on trying a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Received it within two days. (Thanks, Amazon Prine!) My measurements - 5'2" in height, 115 lbs, 25 inch waist with that dreaded lower abdominal "pooch". I got it in a small/size 32 and it fits snug on the first row of hooks. Not too tight or loose. I got this for the sole purpose of creating a more defined hourglass figure so I'll update with an after photo if I remember. The product itself smells horribly of latex but that was expected. It should go away. I wore it for two hours on my first day. A bit uncomfortable when working out (especially while doing squats and deadlifts). For the price, this product is definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Diaz

customer_reviews.title: great for workout.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty no flaws and it fits tight like it's suppose to I wear it 4 hours a day while working out or just being a busy bee. If you're a certain size get a size bigger trust me. Going your size or a size smaller it will be very hard to put on. It won't give you an hour glass shape unless you already have one hidden under your fat. Trust me I know that too. Glad that I have an hour glass shape
customer_reviews.author: raymundo martinez

customer_reviews.title: Believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: I didn't believe the reviews that said so comfy you can work out in this and although I haven't tried to workout in it it was the 1st waist cincher I can wear for over 8 hours comfortably. I bought a Squeem before but it doesn't hold as good as this, you can see the clip lines under clothes as well but with this Ann Cheri that isn't the case
customer_reviews.author: ZebraLibra

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is difficult
customer_reviews.text: I issued a review in the past giving this product a single star due to sizing. The sizing is a difficult task and I recommend you purchase two different sizes. Amazon has a great return policy for Prime members. As for the overall product, it’s fantastic. I lost one inch in the first two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Moore

customer_reviews.title: great product! would recommend
customer_reviews.text: this is the second waist trainer from ann cherry I have purchased. I lost the first one I bought which is why I had to get a new one but it lasted me over two years. absolutely love this product and recommend it to anyone! with a proper diet and exercise, along with wearing this waist trainer, you will definitely see results!!
customer_reviews.author: carrissa eichler

customer_reviews.title: Great material recommend for woman after baby or with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great material recommend for woman after baby or with a little pouch to get the max out of a good work out. Don't expect to change the shape of your waist that's just genetics but to get an extra sweat and back support during your work outs it is a great product you do need to work out this isn't a miracle product that you can do nothing and magically lose so keep your expectations realistic. Bought three of these already. Love this product highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: CMAMA96

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: The first day was uncomfortable but after that it fits perfectly and moves with your body. I wore it to the gym the first day and made me sweat even more than before. I do have to admit it is not easy but you have to be committed. You can't expect to wear this thing and not exercise because it's not a magical waist trainer. I am 5 feet tall, weigh 110 pounds with a 27 inch waist and the size small fits me well even though that first day I thought it wouldn't because without stretching it, it covered half of my waist. Other than that it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Sareda

customer_reviews.title: Ann Chery Womens workout waist trainer
customer_reviews.text: The Waist trainer is made of very good quality materials. It is a little tight the 1st couple of times getting it on, but afterwards it gets easier and easier to get it on. I have worked out in it for about a week and it is easy to move around in at the gym. For some reason it wanted to roll up on my right side at the bottom, but I would just readjust it. But no rolling or lifting anywhere else. I stays put. I have been wearing it around the house also for up to 5 or 6 hrs per day and you really do forget that you have it on after a while.
customer_reviews.author: M H

customer_reviews.title: Im not sure about this.....
customer_reviews.text: Got this product to slim the waist.I havent used it consistantly..but when I do it Is slightly uncomfortable. Maybe I should have hot a bigger size because my hips underarm fat and butt look weird and the waist trainer rolled up on the bottom..So therefore I could not wear it out to get the full affects cuuz I looked all kinds of crazy..My weight flucuates from day to day..so one day it will fit fine another day I looked like an overstuffed sausage link. .You do sweat sweat more while working out...I just need to be more consistant with it to reap the full benefits
customer_reviews.author: RenaeNae

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with the fit on the product
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with the fit on the product. What I'm trying to grasp is why the material with the hooks smell like gasoline..??? I could not get the smell off my hands at all yesterday after putting it on. Wearing it, the smell is extremely overwhelming. Maybe there is some type of oil they have used on that part, or something in the product itself that makes it smell for it to stretch? Anyone else notice this as well?
customer_reviews.author: Wreck_Tangle

customer_reviews.title: Product runs larger than expected. I ordered according to ...
customer_reviews.text: Product runs larger than expected. I ordered according to the size chart but the waist trainer does not fit as snug as it should even on tighter setting which makes it less effective.
customer_reviews.author: West, TX

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but it's hard to clean and ends up smelling bad.
customer_reviews.text: It fits great, and it make me look like Jessica Rabbit. Because it's latex and rubber, it makes me sweat. I don't have issues with sweating, but because the care instructions tell you not to soak the thing in water or clean with warm water, it's impossible to clean it properly. I rinse it with cold water and dish soap, but I still catch a whiff of sweaty gym clothes smell every time I wear it. It's kind of gross, and I'm afraid to be around people when I have it on.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Love so far!
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to leave a review regarding the size because I know I was very confused from reading all the reviews. I'm 5'3 117 lb with an athletic body, I order the small. When I got it yesterday I struggle to get it on but I was able to, and keep it on for 2 hours. Today when I put it on, I was able to close the 2nd row already! Now it's very tight but i'm really glad I didn't order the medium. As far as if it works or not it's still soon to see. I hope this help you ladies!
customer_reviews.author: Erica M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I obviously lifted and did lots of cardio but here is a years difference. I wear it when I work out which is about 5-6 times a week. Very impressed at how much it helped as well helped my balance when squatting heavy! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this but I did have to return my small ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this but I did have to return my small and reorder a medium! I'm 122 pounds 5"4 and the small was extremely small for me. Medium fits perfect! I'm giving a five star because they sent me the medium in no time and the product is great quality :)
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: REVIEW FOR PLUS/CURVY
customer_reviews.text: As noted on most comments the product runs small...that is the whole point to get your waist smaller. This review is specifically for any curvy/plus customer: If you are between 200-230lbs, get the largest size and have someone assist you to put the cincher. It does run short if you are on the curvy/plus size. Yes indeed you will feel the difference within a few days, especially if you cut-out any sugars and have a exercise regimen. After you wear the sports cincher you can move up to the Ann Cherry Latex Waist Cincher, which of course it is especially long on the torso. This product is all worth the talk, in addition the delivery was very fast!
customer_reviews.author: Blissfulpluss

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE SERVICE- DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Ann Chery has horrible service and inconsistent products. I ordered the Faja Deportiva in M- wore it one day and it was way too big & they won't refund it! So I ordered the Latex Faja in SM- the sizes were COMPLETELY off. The SM was practically the same size as the M. Order XS- too small! Now I am stuck having paid over $100 for 3 item that don't fit! Save yourself the money & don't buy here!
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I've never written a review but I feel obligated to tell others this is FAKE -- like other reviewers have mentioned. I, too, ordered an Ann Cherry last year and it's AMAZING. Unfortunately, I left it at my other house and out of laziness just went through my order history on Amazon to see my size and ordered another one. I received this yesterday and I don't even know what it is. The sizing is off, the fabric is cheap and flimsy, and the hooks are cheap and don't stay latched (I'm 96lbs, it's not due to it being too small, just CHEAP). Save yourself the money and hassle of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Swan

customer_reviews.title: Based on my height and weight (5'4" 197lbs) it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Based on my height and weight (5'4" 197lbs) it was suggested to get a 2x but i was barely able to get it buckled and I was worried it would break so I sent it back and bought the 3x instead. Waiting to see how that one fits.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I can see by photos some are getting the right item and some are getting defective ones. This is my second defective one from here. I got the size 40 and it’s smaller than my size 38 it’s not even long enough to cover torso like photos. I have it lined up with my size 38 and you can tell its defective. The width is correct the length isn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey

customer_reviews.title: Fabric gets really bad
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bikin competitor, i usually use it during my prep time. I wear it only when I do my cardiovascular session. Which is 6 week, 45 min. Fabric got really ugly and wrinkled, and bulky. Did not even last a month in good condition. I bought the black one thinking it would be better but same thing happened. These are kind of disposable, not a very good investment for the price, if it was at least half the price, then maybe yea.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Correcting my posture 😊
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9 with a 40 inch waist so I purchased the 2xl. I wasn't lookig for something to make my waist smaller but looked for something that would keep my posture good since I sit at a desk all week at work. As expected its a pretty tight fit and is a little difficult to get on at first. I am in love with this product!! Love how comfortable it is to wear and how much it improves my posture! I have had back issues my entire life and this product takes the pressure off my lower back and helpse not feel as fatigued at the end of the day. I would highly recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: shanda g

customer_reviews.title: but when i tried it on it was perfect! I wore for two months first month for ...
customer_reviews.text: when i first saw it i didn't think it will fit me ,but when i tried it on it was perfect! I wore for two months first month for 10 hours per day and i already noticed that my waist is smaller and the next month for 5 hours per day and i worked out for one hour per day sometimes even for 30 minutes. i really liked the results and i recommend it! btw i usually buy medium pants but i got this one size smaller :)
customer_reviews.author: ALRobayan Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The only waist trainer brand I trust! It’s perfect cos my torso is not so long. But not short either. I’m 5’3” 129lbs and size 30 fits perfectly. It’s tight, but it’s how I want it.
customer_reviews.author: ZchennA

customer_reviews.title: Rolled up
customer_reviews.text: This was okay. It kind of smells like rubber or something, not pleasant but that didn't really bother me. What bothered me was how the bottom rolled up. It just wouldn't stay put so it felt much smaller because the only part doing any work was the top/upper middle parts.
customer_reviews.author: Flores

customer_reviews.title: Extremely small fitting
customer_reviews.text: This trainer is extremely small. I ordered according to the Ann Cherry sizing chart. I couldn’t even get it around my waist. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I got a medium because the reviews scared me into going a size up, but I really shouldn't have. I'm 125lbs and 5'1" and I went to the smaller hook on the medium in only a week or so. Have to order small now. I don't really know how to clean it either, I wiped it with a cloth and sun dried it but it still seems not quite clean.
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: it seems to be fine. I don't know if its eating differently that's ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear this nearly often enough, but when I do, it seems to be fine. I don't know if its eating differently that's making my waist smaller or this, but I can't complain either way. My biggest concern is that while it's too big (I can easily shimmy it up and down), the top of the back has a natural inclination to fold in on itself, which is fairly uncomfortable and unfixable, regardless of how many inches of 'back fat' I lose.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I would advise sizing up in this waist cincher. I normally wear a size small but cannot connect the hooks at all. Reading the reviews now, it was suggested. I wish I would have read the reviews first.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Lovec

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable,  good quality material and beautiful color.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second sport waist trainer from Ann Chery, I also have the classic waist trainer for daily use. I use this for my gym workouts and is very comfortable, it gives support to my back so I have a good posture during my excersice. I have the purple one, and the color es beautiful. I totally recommend this waist trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Massi

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: my Waist is 32 inches and I ordered a medium it was to big I needed a small I’m sad
customer_reviews.author: Andri

customer_reviews.title: Works well while working out
customer_reviews.text: I use the waist cincher while working out. First time, breathing was a bit tough, and I definitely felt rather limited while lifting weights and stretching, but after a couple more times wearing it, I don't really notice it, and it seems to really help with my posture. I actually decided to buy another to wear a few hours each day at work to help with my posture and also hopefully slim down my waistline. Because of the snugness, it also makes me more self-conscious about what I eat. Best part is it really does slim down your entire torso, and it looks great with form-fitting dresses and shirts. Listen to everyone's advice and order one size up.
customer_reviews.author: si.guevarra

customer_reviews.title: The Product Measurements were off
customer_reviews.text: I used the measuring system provided to order my correct size. It was way off.... I'm not sure what to tell you with regard to determining your correct size. It fit like an oversized dress around my chest and I have big ole boobies!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the best waist trainers
customer_reviews.text: These are the best waist trainers. I've had three of these from Ann Chery and in comparison to other brands I've tried, these are by far the best quality. The only issue I have, is over time, the metal boning down the sides does warp and won't lie flat any longer. However, this is after daily wear during weight training and normal wear over the course of several months.
customer_reviews.author: krho

customer_reviews.title: I love this! Comfortable to work out in or wear ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Comfortable to work out in or wear during the day. I bought a medium and in less than a month I had it on the tightest setting. After another two months I am getting ready to purchase a small! It enhanced my work out efforts tremendously and I love how it looks under my clothes. Great product when used in tandem with regular exercise and good diet to aid in weight loss and inch loss on the waist and hips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality of Ann Chery is amazing! It doesn't roll
customer_reviews.text: I followed what the other reviews said and ordered one size larger. It was very snug, but it's supposed to be, that's the whole point. I've gotten used to it after only 3 days and I am going to the second row of hooks today! The quality of Ann Chery is amazing! It doesn't roll, it's soft, and it really supports!! I am so glad I chose this brand. I have already ordered the next size down and I'm hoping to move to the smaller one in another week or two!
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: The hourglass Gods have answered!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my waist trainer in three days, it's great! The back support is AMAZING! I have a very large chest (38 G)...I put that on and it's like Jesus took the wheel! The only down fall I have is that I need a smaller size. I personally think it runs big. Oh, and I don't know why some people say it's uncomfortable. If you've worn shape wear it's no different, just a tighter hug. I love it. And ladies, if you're like me and cannot see below your boobs, get your designated helper. It's a b**** to put on...but worth it! It'll test your patients putting it on but once you're in you aren't going anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Domo :)

customer_reviews.title: size 40
customer_reviews.text: This is so great I wear it all the time at the gym. I just washed it for the first time the other day and its still good as new (Delicate wash, cold water, hung to dry) its long enough to hold in the love handles which is really hard to find and it didn't take long before i was on the second layer of hooks. I'm 5'4, over 175 lbs with a pear shaped body and i ordered the Size 40 blue. I had bought the 36 at first but returned it and got the right size. the return process was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Myrna L Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Wrong Size My Fault
customer_reviews.text: Good quality however my not reading the size chart correctly I ordered a 36 without measuring myself stupidly...I could only close the top and bottom so I gave it to my daughter who has a 27/28 inch waist it fit her perfect & snug...so for my frame at 5"5 160 lbs I wear size 9 or 11 Jeans but my high waist is 31 inch now & low 34 (thats only from 15 lb weight gain) I re-ordered another one today Purple Size 40xxl! Cant wait to get it :)
customer_reviews.author: Luv2shop

customer_reviews.title: I am 5'2 and 120 pounds, size medium was too big, size small not tight enough, may have to order an XS!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this product twice now and may have to go a third time. I measured my waist as 27 inches and followed the size chart and went with the Medium 32 since a lot of the reviews said runs small. I was able to put it on the second clasps with no problem so I returned it and bought the next size down.I have just received the small and I am also able to put it on the second clasps. May have to order yet again so I can get the compression that a waist trainer should give you!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I’ve been Purchasing this item for the past 5 to 6 years and will continue to do so very good quality Dora bowl comfortable and it works
customer_reviews.author: TracyGrace

customer_reviews.title: Great shaper for under clothes
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a few days now, so no major change in my waist; however this is the best body shaped I’ve had. My stomach and waist looks so good in dresses with this underneath. You cannot tell it’s on (unless dress is dry sheer). I’ve had a baby and still have a little gut but with this on I look amazing. It is a little snug and I cannot wear it all day long but it’s getting more comfortable with time. I am 165 5’3 and got a medium...it fits just right (not too lose and not too snug)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fair
customer_reviews.text: Order a size up. Mines was too tight it started leaving marks on my back and under my stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Khadijah Freeman

customer_reviews.title: At first it was hard to get this waist trainer on in took me like 10 minutes but today (the second day) it was ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous that this would be extremely to small as I didn't exactly measure myself but went based off what I thought, so I ordered a small. I am 5'4 and weigh 129 pounds, wear a size 2 in jeans and small in tops. At first it was hard to get this waist trainer on in took me like 10 minutes but today (the second day) it was a lot less painful and i had the hang of it. It's tight and I can definitely feel it doing its job. It is great quality all around the only part i'm worried about is the rubber part where the hooks are, I hope it doesn't rip soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it was fine.
customer_reviews.text: This works well but the problem is that the sizes are weird. I bought a small and it was too big then I bought an extra small and that was way too small. However, the first time I bought a small, it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Gilani

customer_reviews.title: Looks good minus the potruding back fat haha
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited when this waist trainer arrived, and I must note that it came in pretty fast. Because this runs small, I bought one in a size medium which fits me perfectly! I'm 5'1 and weigh 120lbs. The only con I must state is due to the flexible "bones" not connecting from the top and bottom, they tend to curve in at those areas which creates a little potruding layer of back fat above the trainer. (In the second picture, you can sort of see the lump. Wouldn't reccomend wearing it under a tight shirt). Overall, the quality seems pretty good for the price, so I'm satisfied with my purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: justin tran

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I think it really works and I love how comfortable it feels. I'm only annoyed how it feels with the bra all together The picture i included is from 3 days of use
customer_reviews.author: Huda

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Product was way too small needed help taking it off! Order 1 or 2 sizes up. It is a faja though so it is up to you how much compression you like.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy A.

customer_reviews.title: Love. This
customer_reviews.text: I. Freaking. Love. This. Waist Cincher! I've worn it with business and sundresses, t-shirt and jeans, workout wear, just around the house, and a few times to sleep....I just fell asleep. Not on purpose, but the darn thing is so comfortable! Now when I woke up, that was a different story. Yikes. The fit is amazing, and the results are fairly fast. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Hill

customer_reviews.title: 4 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Appeared to be too small at first. It does take a little time and patience to stretch it enough to get it on the first time. Be sure to follow the instructions and start at the bottom first and work your way up. I wore it 4 hours the first day and was able to get it on much easier the following day. I've had it for a few months now and although I don't wear it daily or exercise in it, I do see a difference. I can actually get into clothes that were too tight before. It works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: M Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: And it's not easy to work out with it
customer_reviews.text: It fits little too tight. And it's not easy to work out with it... i only wear it during cardio. I would recommend get bigger size. I am 5'3" size 0-2 , my waist is 26 and 1/2 inches and i got small size. If i try to lift weights with it on, it cuts off blood flow to my tighs so i get lots of bruising from it. Be mindfull ladies
customer_reviews.author: unka

customer_reviews.title: Good waist trainer
customer_reviews.text: I worked my way down to this waist trainer, the print was very cute and it was great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Stacks

customer_reviews.title: Baby Fat (phat)
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I got it today, and boy does it do the job. I'm 4'11 114lb ( baby fat)and I order a small, which fit exactly. It really help with your posture. The first day getting on was a little diffcult, but after I got better putting it on. I started from the top and worked my way down. At first I thought OMG I need a medium, but after getting the small on. I ordered the right size Small. You will need to watch what you eat, there is no way you can have a extra full stomach with this thing on,if so it will make you sick. I hope my review helps BO)
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Henry

customer_reviews.title: The reviews about ordering a size up
customer_reviews.text: I decided to order the product after seeing it on instagram by a different carrier. I read the amazon reviews and decided to go up a next size since everyone said that they run small ...well I started of on the 2nd hooks and I had a gap in the back. I am also tall 5'11 this will not cover my long torso lol. I returned it back without any problems and ordered the black latex one in a smaller size will be delivered today. Hopefully this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Von

customer_reviews.title: Its not easy to waist train
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, Its not easy to waist train. Props to the women who can hang in there for longer then 10 min. The fit and material are great. I had to lay down to put it on but it fit like expected. My only problem is that I can't keep it on for that long. I start getting back pains. I can't comment on the size of my waist changing because obviously you need to keep this on for hoursss. But the material is great. I've seen them being sold for much more at the mall and the material is not as good as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica I.

customer_reviews.title: Its nice just like the photo except its been starting to ...
customer_reviews.text: You have to use the chart to get the correct size dont just guess, Its nice just like the photo except its been starting to roll on front and back so im not liking that. But it works for now I do feel it works a bit. 3 weeks later I slept with the product and it gave me a rash so that was notn fun :/ just dont sleep in it my recommendation, other than that worksn pretty decent.
customer_reviews.author: Aznpryde

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Normally I do not buy my corsets or cinchers from Amazon. I had heard tons of good things about this brand, so I decided to give this one a shot since it was rather basic. AMAZING!!! As someone who does lacing and corsetting habitually I would absolutely recommend this corset for day to day wear. YOU MUST FOLLOW THE SIZING TO A TEE.
customer_reviews.author: Tera Aralyn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful.. I weigh 190 lbs, I'm 5'4" I ordered a 40 and it fit perfectly. I started wearing it on the 7th of March, been wearing it 3 weeks and have already moved to the second row of hooks. I absolutely love it. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: S&D

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a shape
customer_reviews.text: I had for almost 3 years until the metal pieces started cutting into me and I knew it was over. Great while it lasted. Just ordered a Yianna to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Brown

customer_reviews.title: I can easily wear it at work under my clothes
customer_reviews.text: I am 4'11 110 pounds with a 29-30 inch waist. I ordered the small. It is extremely tight (but my understanding is that it is supposed to be). It is too tight to work out in but I can already tell that the more I put it on the easier it is to get into. I can easily wear it at work under my clothes. It is authentic. My only complaint is a roll that it leaves hanging out at the top. If you want to avoid that roll I would suggest ordering the 3-hook trainer (which is 2'' longer) or ordering a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: kia

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my posture and sucks things in when I need them to be
customer_reviews.text: Buy the size based on the chart! I am a 14 pants and I had to get the largest size. Not sure how this will fit even bigger women . It's hard to get on at first, after that it gets easier to do yourself. Helps with my posture and sucks things in when I need them to be. I also use this when working out.
customer_reviews.author: DRCTBJP

customer_reviews.title: I attached a photo so you guys can see what it looks like on me
customer_reviews.text: SIZE UP! I cannot say this enough. I had to get two sizes bigger than I thought I would. I ordered my usual size, returned it, and got two sizes larger. It's tight on the first clasp and I can't wait to make it smaller with the second and the third! I attached a photo so you guys can see what it looks like on me! I'll update with progress 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Walsh

customer_reviews.title: IT NEEDS TO BE TIGHTER! and SMALLER if you want it to work!
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning while you get used to it will feel like you are shocking yourself, but it will worth it., Shape amazing after the 3rd day you get used to it, super comfortable, OFC ITS SMALLER THAN EXPECTED, Because thats what is for, with the use it will get used to your body and it will start shaping it you want it tight so it can work. I love it, i am super happy with it i might get otherone when i get the chance :P Use it often! it will expand and get used to your body.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: The waist trainer did not look like the picture and I have a long torso and when I searched on Amazon this popped up so I decided by and now I regret buying it
customer_reviews.author: Yani Failor

customer_reviews.title: just what i needed
customer_reviews.text: just got mine in the mail today 2 day shipping, pretty comfortable, good material and wasnt too difficult to put on. im 5'4" 122lbs with a 25" waist and ordered a small/32, i can already fit the tighter row of hooks but its much less comfortable than wearing it on the first row, digs into me and the fat on my back but only with tighter row. perfect to work out in for the next few weeks till i can comfortably downsize to an xsmall. overall exactly what i was looking for at a decent price. just double check the seller to make sure you dont order a fake by accident
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Don't be discouraged!
customer_reviews.text: When I first got mine and wrapped it around myself there was a huge gap but you have to SUCK IT IN and really stretch (the material and metal clasps are very sturdy!) and it will work! Mine is a size XXL, I based this off the fact That I am a 36ddd so I added a few inches to encompass my waist. It has improved my overall shape, posture, and sweating during workouts. Love it. First pic is first night trying it on. Following pics are before workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: It's great! It doesn't hurt like some of the ones ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great! It doesn't hurt like some of the ones I have had before, I'm 5'5-5'6 only thing I would change is that I wish it was a little bit longer. At first it was hard to put on but that's normal now it's a little easier and it's great quality as well. You may have back roll issue but I wear a sport bra and it helps. When I first purchase I got a 3xl because everyone said to go a size up but I was able to hook on the second rows so I send it back and got the 2xl it was a little hard at first but I got it on myself. I hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: I always have a super indented mark right around where the product's top sticking ...
customer_reviews.text: ... Probably cause of my body ratio ( 38, 25, 39), but this cincher seems to literally "carve" my upper back. After wearing it, I always have a super indented mark right around where the product's top sticking lays. It's painful. So unless you're an hourglass with a long torso, I truly do not recommend it...
customer_reviews.author: Jean Mendes

customer_reviews.title: The cincher is an Ann Chery not a knockoff like some reviews said it might be
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I'm only a week in. The cincher is an Ann Chery not a knockoff like some reviews said it might be. The first day it was a bit too tight and too small. I ordered a small, it fit like a tight extra small. I wore it to do light workouts all week along with clean eating and it fits perfectly now. I haven't seen any lost inches but I do see a difference in stomach bloating so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ann Chery Women's Faja Deportiva Workout Waist Cincher
product_meta.description: Are you ready to maximize your workout with a faja style waist cinching garment the workout band is an ann cherry waist cincher that you wear anytime you're going to be active. Take it to the gym or for a run outside and let it add impact to your healthy lifestyle routine. Here's how it works. You wrap the band around your midsection. This action creates compression in your core, stimulating thermal activity and ramping up perspiration. This process allows toxins and impurities to exit the skin, while mobilizing fat cells. Put simply, the band helps ensure that your workout is working for you. The band itself is constructed from a latex core with a soft cotton exterior and interior lining. It sits at your waist, extending to the upper abdominals. Two columns of hook-and-eye closures allow you to size the garment down with you. Felix boning anchors the cincher and prevents migration. If you've been thinking about adding a supplement to your active lifestyle, you'll love the power the workout band by ann cherry brings with it
feature_bullets: ACCURATE SIZE SELECTION: PLEASE USE THE SIZE CHART WE PROVIDED IN THE PHOTO GALLERY AND NOT FROM AMAZON LINK. Please do not choose based on other buyers experience, all bodies are different. To properly choose your size, measure your waistline and select based on the measurement indicated on the size chart.

DESCRIPTION: High Quality durable Latex Waist Trainer / Waist Cincher / Shaper for Women Made in Colombia. This Waist Cincher will reduce up to three inches from your waist instantly. The flexible boning provides the structure that allows the latex cincher to help you correct your posture. It also helps to avoid the cincher from rolling up when you seat or move. The rows allow size adjustment when you need to increase compression, or you are in the weight loss period.

LATEX: Our Latex is 100% natural and the best quality in the entire industry. Latex will increase your body temperature to produce a Sauna effect, it will cause you to sweat more, shape and reduce fat cells. The inner layer has been designed to absorb the sweat, to not feel uncomfortable.

ANN CHERY QUALITY: We have been the leader in the compression garment industry for more than 35 years. We produced and manufacture all our garments in our factory in Colombia. Our Waist Cinchers / Shapers / girdles have been designed to last several months and to be used daily. The latex core of this product is approved to be used on your body. Many other cinchers use rubber witch is harmful for your health.

ITEM OTHER USES: This product strong enough to be used as a Boned Waist Training Corset/ Waist Band. It will be invisible if you use the proper clothing, to be used at work, gym or everywhere. The best Waist trimmer in the industry for more than 35 years. Discover why ANN CHERY is…. ALWAYS THE BEST
